# textureLevel

**Instance Property**

The index of the mipmap level in the texture to update.

## Declaration

```swift
var textureLevel: Int
```

## Discussion

Provide a value between `0` and the texture’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture/firstMipmapInTail].
